generate_series.description: Expands range arguments into a set of rows.
Expands range arguments into a set of rows.
Expands range arguments into a set of rows.
Expands range arguments into a set of rows.
generate_series.example: SELECT * FROM generate_series(to_timestamp(10) without time zone,to_timestamp(22) without time zone,'1 second'::interval);

generate_series.description: Expands range arguments into a set of rows.
generate_series.example: SELECT * FROM generate_series(to_timestamp(10) at time zone 'Etc/UTC',to_timestamp(22),'1 second'::interval)

generate_subscripts.description: Expands array arguments into a set of rows.
